(Cyberwolf gave me control of Lunaprine a few days ago via e-mail)

Serpentor/Lunaprine:




Lunaprine transformed into his wolf mode, leaping at Serpentor and snapping 
his jaws shut.

---

Serpentor let out a yell as Lunaprine's teeth sunk into his left wrist.  "YOU 
FREAK!" he yelled, slamming a fist down into Luna's 'face' with little effect 
as the wolfbot began jerking his head around, worsening the wound.
